item.title: The Power of Data Oriented Programming in Java
item.description: Most of the applications we developers are working on are have to do with data. We are getting data from “outside world”, save it and pass further. And it does not matter how complex the domain is we always ask the next questions: How do I know for sure that my data is valid? How do I avoid errors in my system and do not inject it into other system? The answer is - better data modeling.
